name: market for barley seed, organic, for sowing | barley seed, organic, for sowing | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/479/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'barley seed, organic, for sowing', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;The product 'barley seed, organic, for sowing' is a seed. It is an annual crop. This seed product is used for plant propagation. The seed produced at the farm is transported to the processing centre, treated (pre-cleaning, cleaning, eventually drying, chemical dressing (for integrated production) and bag filling), stored and afterwards transported to the regional storage centre. This product is produced through organic agricultural practices which do not include fertiliser and pesticide application.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'barley seed, organic, for sowing',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  barley seed, organic, for sowing', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
